plot: A love story about two teenagers who fall in love, have a child, and escape from their families in an attempt to make life for themselves in New York City.
title: Seed of Innocence
plot_es: A love story about two teenagers who fall in love, have a child, and escape from their families in an attempt to make life for themselves in New York City.
plot_en: A love story about two teenagers who fall in love, have a child, and escape from their families in an attempt to make life for themselves in New York City.
